thread.title: Global Markets Begin the Week Higher

author: Gregor Stuart Hunter
title: Global Markets Begin the Week Higher

organizations.name: global markets begin the week higher asia-pacific

text:
The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell Monday, dragged down by declines in shares of Caterpillar and Boeing.
The blue-chip index dropped 141 points, or 0.6%, to 25194, turning lower after rising as much as 113 points earlier in the session. The S&P 500 swung between small gains and losses. The Nasdaq Composite climbed 0.5%, on pace to set a closing high for the second consecutive session.
